title: Dead Days: Season Five
description: In October 2013, a chaotic infection spread across Britain, turning the majority of the population into bloodthirsty zombies.The weak fell. Many of the strong fell, too. The only survivors were those willing to sink to the most brutal depths of humanity in order to further their own existence.Dead Days is the story of a group of those survivors.The journey to the BLZ is over. Our survivors' lives hang in the balance. Terrifying new horrors lurk around every corner of this living hell...Who will escape? Who will survive?And even if they do, will they be able to handle a staggering new truth?A horrifying truth that reveals itself as Season Five hurtles towards its conclusion?One thing is for certain...There will be blood. There will be tears. In the Dead Days, nobody is safe.
author: Ryan Casey
